The 'T-62' is a Soviet main battle tank, a further development of the T-55. Its
115 mm gun was the first smoothbore tank gun in use.

The T-62 was produced between 1961 and 1975. It became a standard tank in the
Soviet arsenal, partly replacing the T-55, although that tank continued to be
manufactured in the Soviet Union and elsewhere after T-62 production was halted.
The T-62 was later replaced in front-line service by the T-72.
categories: Cold War tanks of the Soviet Union
